Generated Narrative: ValueSet Pupil-Diameter-Comparison

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in https://larfuma.github.io/fhir-eyecare-ig/CodeSystem/custom-codes-to-be-submitted-to-SNOMED-or-LOINC
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    anisocoria-right-pupil-larger-than-leftAnisocoria right pupil larger than left pupilA finding of Anisocoria with the right pupil having a larger diameter than the left pupil.
    anisocoria-left-pupil-larger-than-rightAnisocoria left pupil larger than right pupilA finding of Anisocoria with the left pupil having a larger diameter than the right pupil.
  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    301943000Pupils equal (finding)

name: Pupil-Diameter-Comparison
title: Pupil-Diameter-Comparison
description: A ValueSet containing codes for various pupillomotor function observations.
